column1: Bubo bubo; Eurasian Eagle-owl;This largest representative of owls leads a rather secretive lifestyle. It is estimated that between 300 and 400 pairs of these birds live in Poland. She lays her eggs in abandoned nests of birds of prey
column2: on rock shelves or directly on the ground. As a specialized predator
column3: it eats mainly medium-sized mammals and birds
column4: but it does not disdain invertebrates
column5: as well as young roe deer and deer.;LC;https://www.iucnredlist.org/species/22688927/113569670
